item.title: Precautions for Investigations
item.author: Rich
item.description: Digital Officer Safety We are all ingrained with a law enforcement concern, that above all else, officer safety is key. Investigators sometimes lose sight of what this means for them in their role. This is mainly due to the large scale differences between patrol and investigative work, but we shouldn’t underestimate the need for officer safety in all that we do. After all, if you are hurt or injured as an investigator, you aren’t there to be able to help your colleagues when they need you the most.
